title: Your Trusted Team of AI Agents for your Call Center
subtitle: Build your own branded AI call center to service your clients with 24/7 conversational voice agents.

mainSection.title: Offer premium call center services—without building AI from scratch
mainSection.subtitle: White-label our platform to deliver AI voice agents under your brand for your end customers, enabling inbound support, outbound campaigns, lead qualification, appointment scheduling, and more.

bulletPoints.title: Fully‑branded voice agents
bulletPoints.description: Customize every interaction with your own logos, tone, and domain—no white-labeling clues. Your agents become the face of your business

bulletPoints.title: Inbound & outbound campaigns
bulletPoints.description: PRun proactive outreach (e.g. renewals, surveys, promotions) and support lines seamlessly—24/7 automated calls powered by natural-language AI in <500 ms

bulletPoints.title: Lead qualification & appointment booking
bulletPoints.description: Let AI filter and qualify leads, ask key questions, and schedule follow‑ups in your CRM—all under your own brand and management dashboard

ctaSection.title: See Buildnow AI in action
ctaSection.description: Try our live call center demo—experience branded AI agents handling inbound queries, outbound campaigns, and booking flows. Just sign in and test them yourself.

secondarySection.title: Scale your call center business—easily
secondarySection.subtitle: Built on a secure, scalable platform:

bulletPoints.title: Complete white‑label control
bulletPoints.description: Host the platform on your domain, customize branding, manage sub‑accounts and permissions via an agency dashboard

bulletPoints.title: Launch campaigns instantly
bulletPoints.description: Deploy new voice agents and scripts with no-code tools; integrate with telephony systems and dialer workflows for global coverage.

bulletPoints.title: Smart hand-off to human agents
bulletPoints.description: AI agents handle routine calls and escalate complex matters to live agents—passing full context and call history.

testimonialsSection.title: Proven results across industries
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Leading call centers trust our AI solutions to improve efficiency and customer satisfaction.

testimonials.description: How TechSupport Pro reduced average call time by 40% while improving customer satisfaction scores.
How CustomerFirst increased first-call resolution rates by 60% with AI-powered agent assistance.
How GlobalHelp scaled to handle 3x more calls without increasing headcount using AI agents.

finalCta.title: Build your team of AI Voice Agents
finalCta.description: Join hundreds of call centers already using AI to deliver better customer experiences while reducing operational costs.
